Articles.Content:
I am a long time lurker who decided to make an account. Feels great.
Quick question, how exactly would I post a picture, like a challenge proof submission? Edited November 19, 2015 by Spaceboy720

I am a long-time member. It does feel great.

Welcome to the forum. :D

Hello Spaceboy720, and welcome to the forums!

Come in from the cold, lurker.

Happy landings!

Welcome.

First, upload the picture to a hosting site, such as imgur.
Paste a link to the site here.
For imgur itself the BBCode is, for example [ img ]http://i.imgur.com/jtVpeFJl.png[ /img ] (without the spaces)
